communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Any records in the year 2023, including email, text, memos, or other, that include the following names or phrases: "Indivisible Aurora," "Aurora Community Fridge," "Aurora Fridge Project," "Aurora Fridge," or "Endiro Fridge." Additionally, any words or phrases that combine "Casino," "Hollywood Casino," "Hollywood," and "Fridge."

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available  or CD-ROM or USB if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Luma N Webster
